divs: Sighting DetailsWe went for a weekend trip, to Apache Junction (Superstition Mt.'s). First we we stopped at Goldfield Ghost Town, but it was packed, so instead of stopping we just decided to drive the series of highways that make up the Apache Trail, that goes completely around the Superstition Mountains. I do not remember exactly where we stopped on the hwy for this picture, but it was early in the trip before the 3 lakes. Anyway took the picture, downloaded it to my computer and there it was. I have no idea what that thing is, but if you have some idea, I would like the information. Thanks!
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Apache Junction
There were no other sightings in Apache Junction on or around January 22nd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Found strange fire-looking globe/orb in picture we took Superstition Mtns, Apache Junction, AZ
